title: My pixel phone battery shuts off and wont turn back on unless i keep it plugged into a charger.
content: Ive tried everything and i just want to be able to use a phone when i leave my house i littarely have to keep my phone plugged into a charger 100% of the time to prevent it from shutting down and when it does come back on it has myabee 30% battery but it was 100 b4 it shut off
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3 XL
